parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ error: 'unauthorized', status: 401, message: 'Invalid or expired admin token' }) }}

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO health_checks (service_name, status, response_time_ms, error_message, checked_by, metrics)
VALUES {{ $json.results.map(r => `('${r.service}', '${r.status}', ${r.response_time_ms || 'NULL'}, ${r.error_message ? `'${r.error_message.replace(/'/g, "''")}'` : 'NULL'}, CAST('{{ $json.admin_user_id }}' AS UUID), ${r.metrics ? `'${JSON.stringify(r.metrics)}'::jsonb` : 'NULL'})`).join(', ') }};

=INSERT INTO system_status (overall_status, services_status, system_metrics, last_checked_at)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.overall_status }}',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.services_status) }}'::jsonb,
  {{ $json.system_metrics ? `'${JSON.stringify($json.system_metrics)}'::jsonb` : 'NULL' }},
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET
  overall_status = EXCLUDED.overall_status,
  services_status = EXCLUDED.services_status,
  system_metrics = EXCLUDED.system_metrics,
  last_checked_at = EXCLUDED.last_checked_at
RETURNING id;
